mapper.select: select s.id, s.title, round(avg(r.rating),1) as rating , s.content, sc.show_type, s.img_route, s.title, s.start_date, s.end_date, l.location from show_tb as s LEFT JOIN review_tb as r on r.show_id = s.id JOIN category_tb as sc on s.show_type_id = sc.id LEFT JOIN user_tb AS u ON r.user_id = u.id JOIN hole_tb AS h ON h.id = s.hole_id JOIN location_tb as l ON l.id = h.location_id where s.show_status=1 GROUP BY s.title ORDER BY s.id DESC;
